mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.content, u.name from article a join user_account u on a.user_account_id = u.login_id order by id desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select a.id, a.title, a.content, u.name from article a join user_account u on a.user_account_id = u.login_id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into article(user_account_id, title, content, created_at) values (#{article.userAccountId}, #{article.title}, #{article.content}, #{article.createdAt});
